biography.short: a passionate software engineer building robust web & mobile applications. Interested in TypeScript, React, NestJS & GraphQL

points: Integrated Github OAuth Flow into Kotakode's existing authentication system
Built a mentioning feature that is integrated into the notification feature where users are able to mention each other through questions, answers, comments, and blogs
Implemented TDD in the scope of unit testing to E2E testing with Cypress

projects.title: React Pokédex
projects.description: a simple & modern pokédex to look up at pokémons. View your favorite pokemon status & information with elegant & fashion. The data of the pokemons was fetched from PokéAPI, which is an open-source public API that serves pokemons data, please support them! .

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: personal portfolio site made with Next.js, it consists of my biography, experience, contacts, and also the projects that i have made either on solo or team projects. The design is based on my favorite color!
